desc: This is the proposed STU1 version of the SMART Health Cards and Links FHIR IG for ballot in September 2024. It is sponsored by the HL7 FHIR Infrastructure Work Group
title: SMART Health Cards and Links FHIR IG
introduction: The SMART Health Cards and Links FHIR Implementation Guide defines secure, standards-based mechanisms for individuals to store, share, and manage their health data.
